name: The Legend of Han-Tyumi
description:
The Legend of Han-Tyumi is a short, Interactive Fiction story completed for UCF's Computer as a Medium class.  While the game only takes a few minutes to click through, it features some fun flavor text and world building within it.

The story follows Han-Tyumi, an amnesiac robot who has just waken up from a long slumber. Explore who Han-Tyumi was and what he's become in this short IF adventure!
